directions: Coarsely chop potatoes and transfer to a nonstick cookie sheet. Toss with oil, peppers, onions and seasonings and place in the oven 25 minutes, turning twice with spatula. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 tablespoon grill seasoning (recommended: McCormick's Montreal Steak Seasoning)
title: Oven Home Fries with Peppers and Onions
